meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kerr Houston Amy Drittler Dan Adkison Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6360.

td.p: Kerr Houston, a professor of art history from Baltimore, Maryland
Amy Drittler, a university public relations director from Tazewell, Tennessee
Dan Adkison, a copy editor from Brooklyn, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $31,800)

tr.td: MARINE BIOLOGY
BRAND NAMES
MAN: RAY
PRO TEAM ADDRESSES
AXIS & ALLIES
ONOMATOPOETIC WORDS
